committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity

official_title: To make amounts provided under the Operation Safe Home and New Approach Anti-Drug programs available for use for providing law enforcement officers to patrol and provide security for housing assisted by the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
short_title: HUD Housing Security and Flexibility Act

summary.text: HUD Housing Security and Flexibility Act - Authorizes Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) field offices to use amounts received under the Operation Safe Home or the New Approach Anti-Drug programs for contracts with law enforcement officers or agencies to provide housing security or protective services at HUD-owned or-assisted housing.

titles.title: HUD Housing Security and Flexibility Act
